queries.name: 5aHL
queries.title: 5aHL
queries.description: LSE doctoral theses 1926-2021 with author links to Wikipedia pages where available

queries.name: 5b4L
queries.title: 5b4L
queries.description: Chains of doctoral students/advisors in the project (as of August 2022 the longest is 4)

queries.name: 5WYp
queries.title: 5WYp
queries.description: Relationships between thesis supervisors and authors. Extends beyond LSE's digitised theses by drawing on Wikidata statements for people educated at or employed by LSE with a doctoral student/supervisor relationship. This is such a large dataset it will be a little slow to open

queries.name: 63Jh
queries.title: 63Jh
queries.description: Relationships between notable thesis authors and supervisors where both have a Wikipedia page. Shown in list format.

queries.name: 7p8V
queries.title: 7p8V
queries.description: Relationships between notable thesis authors and supervisors where both have a Wikipedia page. Shown in graph format

queries.name: 5aMU
queries.title: 5aMU
queries.description: * Graph, with images where available, of awards won by LSE thesis authors and supervisors

queries.name: 5djt
queries.title: 5djt
queries.description: Graph, with images where available, of awards won by LSE thesis authors and supervisors.

queries.name: 5aLx
queries.title: 5aLx
queries.description: Other institutions holding archives about LSE thesis authors and supervisors.

queries.name: 5d66
queries.title: 5d66
queries.description: Graph, with images where available, showing relationships between LSE thesis authors and supervisors and archive-holding institutions.

queries.name: 5aG5
queries.title: 5aG5
queries.description: Bubble chart showing main subjects of the thesis set. [In progress with data added up to 1996 so far]

queries.name: 7Kiz
queries.title: 7Kiz
queries.description: Bubble chart showing types of main subjects (depicts what the main subject is an instance of) [In progress with data added up to 1996 so far]

queries.name: 7Kj6
queries.title: 7KjB
queries.description: Map of places that have been the subject of an LSE thesis (relies on that place having coordinates in Wikidata) [In progress with data added up to 1996 so far]

queries.name: 7KjB
queries.title: 7KjB
queries.description: Table of places that have been the subject of an LSE thesis (relies on that place having coordinates in Wikidata) [In progress with data added up to 1996 so far]

queries.name: 5b3Y
queries.title: 5b3Y
queries.description: Map showing employer location of LSE thesis authors and supervisors.

queries.name: 5b3r
queries.title: 5b3r
queries.description: Table of employers of LSE thesis authors and supervisors.

queries.name: 5bhs
queries.title: 5bhs
queries.description: Table of LSE thesis authors who have subsequently been employed by LSE (and any additional employers for those individuals).

queries.name: 5buq
queries.title: 5buq
queries.description: Bubble chart showing occupations of LSE thesis authors.

queries.name: 5but
queries.title: 5but
queries.description: Bubble chart showing field of work for LSE thesis authors and supervisors.

queries.name: 5b43
queries.title: 5b43
queries.description: Map showing location of other educational institutions attended by LSE thesis authors and supervisors.

queries.name: 5b49
queries.title: 5b49
queries.description: Table of educational institutions attended by LSE thesis authors and supervisors.

queries.name: 5beu
queries.title: 5beu
queries.description: Table of ORCIDs for LSE thesis authors and supervisors.

queries.name: 5bhz
queries.title: 5bhz
queries.description: Table of LSE thesis authors and supervisors with a Wikipedia page.

queries.name: 5aTp
queries.title: 5aTp
queries.description: Image grid of authors and supervisors in the LSEThesisProject, where available in Wikimedia Commons.

queries.name: 5ckW
queries.title: 5ckW
queries.description: An experimental query listing works cited by LSE theses. This is not metadata we hold, but Wikidata may make some interesting connections for us - as of May 2023 there are 5 results!

queries.name: 5eTJ
queries.title: 5eTJ
queries.description: Similarly this experimental query looks for connections Wikidata could make, this time seeking works citing an LSE thesis - as of September 2022 we have our first 16 results!

queries.name: 5d55
queries.title: 5d55
queries.description:
The  Wikidata Thesis Toolkit, has been co-authored by LSE and the University of York to reduce the development burden for other universities wanting to carry out a Wikidata thesis project.  

We have had lots of discussion with the  New Zealand Thesis Project and this query shows items on the focus list of both our projects.

queries.name: jwZ
queries.title: jwZ
queries.description: Count of doctoral theses by institution

queries.name: 5bgK
queries.title: 5bgK
queries.description: This query will show any missing reciprocal links between doctoral students and advisors As of September 2022 all students and supervisors are linked, but if any duplicate records are merged, the links need to be re-created, so this query should be periodically checked to maintain data quality.
